Your legendary compilations rock on!  You are quite right, 59 is an awkward number!  Thank you so much.  My wife is stuck in China because of visa issue, and she loves the music I send her via your compilations.  Much love!

Soooo awesome!  I hope 60 is not the last of this amazing series!  ;)

You rock!!
